28 class CLSMPixel : public TTTRRange{
29 
30  friend class CLSMLine;
31  friend class CLSMImage;
32 
33 protected:
35  std::vector<unsigned int > tttr_indices;
36  bool filled;
37 
38 public:
39 
40  std::vector<unsigned int > get_tttr_indices(){
41  return tttr_indices;
42  }
43 
44  void append(unsigned int v){
45  tttr_indices.emplace_back(v);
46  }
47 
48  CLSMPixel():
49  tttr_indices(0),
50  filled(false)
51  {};
52 
53  CLSMPixel(const CLSMPixel& old_pixel) :
54  tttr_indices(old_pixel.tttr_indices)
55  {}
56 
57 };
58 
59 
60 class CLSMLine : public TTTRRange{
61 
62  friend class CLSMFrame;
63  friend class CLSMImage;
64 
65 private:
66  std::vector<CLSMPixel*> pixels;
67 
68 public:
69  unsigned int n_pixel;
70  unsigned int pixel_duration;
71 
72  std::vector<CLSMPixel*> get_pixels(){
73  return pixels;
74  }
75 
76  unsigned long long get_pixel_duration(){
77  return (size_t) (get_duration() / n_pixel);
78  }
79 
80  CLSMLine()
81  {}
82 
83  ~CLSMLine(){
84  for(auto p: pixels){
85  delete(p);
86  }
87  }
88 
89  CLSMLine(
90  const CLSMLine& old_line,
91  bool fill = false
92  ){
93  // private attributes
94  if(fill){
95  for(auto &p: old_line.pixels){
96  pixels.emplace_back(new CLSMPixel(*p));
97  n_pixel++;
98  }
99  } else{
100  for(auto &p: old_line.pixels){
101  pixels.emplace_back(new CLSMPixel());
102  n_pixel++;
103  }
104  }
105  }
106 
107  CLSMLine(
108  unsigned int line_start
109  ){
110  start = line_start;
111  }
112 
113  CLSMLine(
114  unsigned int line_start,
115  unsigned int n_pixel
116  ){
117  start = line_start;
118  CLSMLine::n_pixel = n_pixel;
119  for(unsigned int i=0; i<n_pixel; i++){
120  auto* pixel = new CLSMPixel();
121  pixels.emplace_back(pixel);
122  }
123  }
124 
125  void append(CLSMPixel* pixel){
126  pixels.emplace_back(pixel);
127  n_pixel++;
128  pixel_duration = (unsigned int) (get_duration() / n_pixel);
129  }
130 
131  CLSMPixel* operator[](unsigned int i_pixel){
132  return pixels[i_pixel];
133  }
134 
135 };
136 
137 
138 class CLSMFrame: public TTTRRange{
139 
140  friend class CLSMImage;
141 
142 private:
143  std::vector<CLSMLine*> lines;
144 
145 public:
146  unsigned int n_lines;
147 
148  std::vector<CLSMLine*> get_lines(){
149  return lines;
150  }
151 
152  CLSMFrame();
153 
154  CLSMFrame(
155  const CLSMFrame& old_frame,
156  bool fill = false
157  ){
158  // private attributes
159  for(auto l: old_frame.lines){
160  lines.emplace_back(new CLSMLine(*l, fill));
161  n_lines++;
162  }
163  }
164 
165  ~CLSMFrame(){
166  for(auto l: lines){
167  delete(l);
168  }
169  }
170 
171  CLSMFrame(size_t frame_start);
172 
173  void append(CLSMLine * line);
174 
175  CLSMLine* operator[](unsigned int i_line){
176  return lines[i_line];
177  }
178 };

321  // Constructor
322  CLSMImage();
323 
324  CLSMImage(
325  const CLSMImage& old_clsm,
326  bool fill=false
327  ){
328  // private attributes
329  for(auto f: old_clsm.frames){
330  frames.emplace_back(new CLSMFrame(*f, fill));
331  }
332  // public attributes
333  marker_frame = old_clsm.marker_frame;
334  marker_line_start = old_clsm.marker_line_start;
335  marker_line_stop = old_clsm.marker_line_stop;
336  marker_event = old_clsm.marker_event;
337  n_frames = old_clsm.n_frames;
338  n_lines = old_clsm.n_lines;
339  n_pixel = old_clsm.n_pixel;
340  }
341 
366  CLSMImage(
367  TTTR *tttr_data,
368  std::vector<unsigned int> marker_frame_start,
369  unsigned int marker_line_start,
370  unsigned int marker_line_stop,
371  unsigned int marker_event_type,
372  unsigned int n_pixel_per_line,
373  std::string reading_routine
374  );
375 
376  ~CLSMImage(){
377  for(auto frame : frames){
378  delete(frame);
379  }
380  }
381 };
